abstract: Virginia's State General Assembly gives final approval to legislation allowing more holders of concealed-weapons permits to carry guns in the state, among other provisions.
lead_paragraph: The State General Assembly has given final approval to legislation that would allow more holders of concealed-weapon permits to carry guns in the state.

headline.main: Virginia: Bill Allowing More Concealed Guns Passes
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Bill Allowing More Concealed Guns Passes

snippet: The State General Assembly has given final approval to legislation that would allow more holders of concealed-weapon permits to carry guns in the state.
